allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initialize Upstream Sourcing Engine with CoStar API reference data

- Add project structure with agents, orchestrator, apps, packages
- Create 6 Claude Code subagents for deal sourcing pipeline
- Document CoStar BFF API payload structure and filters
- Add verified lookups: property types, owner types, loan filters,
  construction status, tenancy, building class, markets
- Create sourcing-strategies.md with 22 executable plays
- Include loan distress filters \(payment status, CMBS, LTV, DSCR\)
- Add US markets lookup \(521 markets with IDs\)
- Include industrial analytics data for value estimation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
